message: Let's be fair, I deserve a bit more
Fair is fair. Now it's my turn to get a slightly better share.
You had your chance, now it's my turn again
The clock is ticking, Alice. Let's settle this - a slight advantage to me, but we both win.
Time is running out, I'm increasing my share
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take it before inflation eats away at our potential winnings!
